001
002package io.vrap.rmf.base.client;
003
004import java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture;
005
006import com.fasterxml.jackson.core.type.TypeReference;
007import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JavaType;
008import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.ObjectMapper;
009
010/**
011 * Implementation of a non executable {@link ApiHttpClient}
012 */
013public class SerializerOnlyApiHttpClient implements ApiHttpClient {
014    public static final String NO_EXECUTABLE_API_CLIENT = "No executable api client";
015    private final ResponseSerializer serializer;
016
017    private SerializerOnlyApiHttpClient(ResponseSerializer serializer) {
018        this.serializer = serializer;
019    }
020
021    public static SerializerOnlyApiHttpClient of() {
022        return new SerializerOnlyApiHttpClient(ResponseSerializer.of());
023    }
024
025    public static SerializerOnlyApiHttpClient of(ObjectMapper objectMapper) {
026        return new SerializerOnlyApiHttpClient(ResponseSerializer.of(objectMapper));
027    }
028
029    public static SerializerOnlyApiHttpClient of(ResponseSerializer serializer) {
030        return new SerializerOnlyApiHttpClient(serializer);
031    }
032
033    @Override
034    public <O> CompletableFuture<ApiHttpResponse<O>> execute(ApiHttpRequest request, Class<O> outputType) {
035        throw new IllegalStateException(NO_EXECUTABLE_API_CLIENT);
036    }
037
038    @Override
039    public <O> CompletableFuture<ApiHttpResponse<O>> execute(ApiHttpRequest request, TypeReference<O> outputType) {
040        throw new IllegalStateException(NO_EXECUTABLE_API_CLIENT);
041    }
042
043    @Override
044    public <O> CompletableFuture<ApiHttpResponse<O>> execute(ApiHttpRequest request, JavaType outputType) {
045        throw new IllegalStateException(NO_EXECUTABLE_API_CLIENT);
046    }
047
048    @Override
049    public <O> CompletableFuture<ApiHttpResponse<O>> execute(ClientRequestCommand<O> method) {
050        throw new IllegalStateException(NO_EXECUTABLE_API_CLIENT);
051    }
052
053    @Override
054    public ResponseSerializer getSerializerService() {
055        return serializer;
056    }
057
058    @Override
059    public CompletableFuture<ApiHttpResponse<byte[]>> execute(ApiHttpRequest request) {
060        throw new IllegalStateException(NO_EXECUTABLE_API_CLIENT);
061    }
062
063    @Override
064    public void close() throws Exception {
065
066    }
067}
